achievements: Starred in the original Star Trek series as Khan Noonien Singh
Known for his roles in films like 'Sayonara' and 'The Great Escape'
Voice actor for numerous animated films and television shows
One of the most successful Latin American singer-songwriters
Known for his romantic ballads and socially conscious lyrics
Won numerous awards including Grammy Awards and Billboard Latin Music Awards
Played as a central defender for clubs like Chelsea, Real Madrid and Portugal national team
Won numerous trophies including Premier League titles, Champions League and European Championship
